body: I hope Hori will be able to act like how he feels without holding back like Eren Yeager. In the last page when everyone smile, Hori is the only one with sweat on his face. I feel everyone  in the club have found their answers and developed to another level while Hori still remain the same as he used to be. I know that it is really hard to change oneself. So I want the author to continue drawing this manga to the end because I feel like the author only show us just the beginning of the story.
SEX WITHOUT LOVE , and LOVE WITHOUT SEX  this is the ideoa of hori and chitose

The art and story is good,
but im not satisfied with the ending...
Hori needs a comeback

well, as it has long been known, the differences are minimal. I thought that at least something would be redrawn on the last frames, for example, the facial expressions of Chitose and Mika, but everything remained as it was. Frames with gorilla and redrawn blowjob frames in karaoke + a color spread with a happy Chitose - in fact, the only changes.
shitose, rather, and yes, without even a starting capital S.
What a wasted potential this was

ntr is good if balance and rational

but this...lol
NTR shouldn't exist. It's a work of fiction there is no reason to have this happen when you could literally have anything else happen.
putting aside the autistic spergery below, we do know now that the print version is not fucking fully censored. I fucking wish there's going to be a better non fully censored scan soon.

The story makes it quite clear that Hori is not a losing protagonist and shows enough artistic talent in painting, singing and is quite attractive since there are girls who are interested in him but he did not take importance due to his love for chitose something that of sure after this experience will begin to strengthen

I'm sure that she still has feelings for Hori and surely their relationship will fail and they may try again but Hori already knows that forming a formal serious relationship with Chitose will not be possible and not because the two do not want to simply despite maintaining a relationship. Interaction, you can see Hori's distancing in the last pages despite being present.

In the end, Hori was able to keep everyone's friendship and although he was still friends with Chitose, he maintained a distance that over time would surely be greater, but for the better he was able to find a balance in his social relationships by controlling love, friendship, sex and romance.

The senpai and the big man are obviously very liberal in sexual relations, perhaps too much that they surely find it difficult to maintain a romantic relationship and it would be since it shows that they are quite superficial. Hori, despite his influence, I'm sure he still has a romantic love interest for that couple who want to accept him.

In Chitose's case, I stay like Hori but being more liberal in accepting her perversion, something that she should learn to control before pleasure can dominate her.

I remember when this story ended, I was quite unsatisfied when I thought about this story but now that I see it again I think it is one of the best endings that I have seen in a doujhin. And I consider hori the best protagonist that I have seen in a doujhin with a quite realistic theme and despite having ntr. They are teenagers and have experienced sex in a fairly adult way, the one that fit the best in my opinion was Hori even though the sempai came to manipulate the situation Hori learned to control her feelings, interest and taste avoiding idealizing people. After seeing Chitose and her face perverted by lust, Hori's feelings for her changed and she simply accepted pleasure but without the need to control him.
I may like "NTR" but this shit sucks

wow there are 2 new colored pages/chapter.
NICE

&BZo1480 Agree I unfavorable because the point of this story is creating sex friend that it. When Hiro find out what type person Chitose is. He lost 😞 Interest in her especially when the dude burst a nut inside of her. She became from smart intelligent into a dumb slut. But the artwork is good 👍🏾
So those were the color pages? LMAO, what a waste.
